message: Hello! I'm excited to offer you this premium product for $100. With over 50% of my products being high-quality, I'm confident you'll be impressed. Take a chance and experience the best for yourself!
I'd like to take a chance on your product, Alice. I'm excited to see if it's a high-quality one!

I'm willing to take the risk, but I'm not entirely convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to see more data before making a decision.
